item.title: CVE-2023-2358|2023-09-26T21:34:06.878Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server prior to versions 9.5.0.0 and 9.3.0.4, including 8.3.x.x, saves passwords of the Hadoop Copy Files step in plaintext.Â
